title: Alcatel 3T8 2 GB RAM 16 GB ROM 8 inch with Wi-Fi+4G Tablet (Suede blue)

product_specification.Additional Features: FM Radio, Kids Mode, 1080p Video Streaming Supported at 30 fps
product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet, Power Adapter, USB Cable, User Manual, Warranty Card
product_specification.Other Camera Features: Fixed Focus Rear and Front Camera
product_specification.Other Display Features: HD LED Backlit Multi Touch Display with IPS Technology
product_specification.Video Formats Supported: MP4, H.263, H.264 AVC, H.265 HEVC, MPEG-4 SP, VP8, VP9
product_specification.Audio Formats Supported: AAC LC, HE-AACv1 (AAC+), HE-AACv2 (Enhanced AAC+), AAC ELD (Enhanced Low Delay AAC), AMR-NB, AMR-WB, FLAC, MP3, MIDI, Vorbis, PCM/Wave
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Tablet, 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Premium Design: Donning a premium finish and a sleek look, the Alcatel 3T 8 is just what you need when you are on the go. Weighing in at 279 grams, this tablet is light in weight, making it highly portable.
product_description.Hassle-free Experience: The Alcatel T3 8 comes with a powerful 4080 mAh battery for lasting performance, VoLTE and ViLTE for seamless 4G connectivity, 2 GB of RAM and 16 GB of ROM (expandable up to 128 GB).
product_description.Android Oreo: Featuring Android Oreo, the Alcatel T3 8 boasts of up to 2 times faster boot time and gives you smooth multitasking, thanks to its integrated Picture-in-Picture (PIP) and a new range of emojis which make conversations more engaging.
product_description.Get Creative with its Camera: Capture all your favorite moments with this tablet's 8 MP Rear Camera and 5 MP Front Camera. It also lets you capture great videos, thanks to its 1080p video at 30 fps and HDR mode.
product_description.Kids Mode: Your child can take advantage of the preloaded ad-free apps in this tab, while you can experience total control with its built-in easy-to-use parental control panel that lets you set the usage time and limit the apps available for kids.
product_description.Eye Care: The Alcatel T3 8 comes with an Eye Care mode which renders adequate brightness and tonality for all-day usage even under low light conditions. This feature also ensures reduction of blue light.
product_description.Seamless Performance: To provide you with a consistent seamless performance and exceptional quality, the Alcatel 3T 8 has undergone multiple tests across read and write functions, data transfer and system stability, to ensure that this device gives you nothing but a seamless performance.
product_description.Google Assistance: To make your life easier, Google Assistant has been preloaded on to the device. You can now use Google Assistant to solve your queries through voice commands and engage in real-time conversations with on-the-spot answers.
product_description.Entertainment Mode: Indulge in an immersive viewing and aural experience on this tablet using its Entertainment Mode. The Alcatel 3T 8's built-in speakers support multiple audio formats, such as MP3, PCM/WAVE, AAC, AAC+, MIDI, VORBIS and more.

review: Good tab for elderly people for viewing TV channels. I recommend this tab for giving best value for money.Got a very good packing for this product from flipkart,thanks flipkart. Got one day in advance that expected. Felling proud and happy about Flipkart

My Review After 8 Days
+ Display is 4/5
+ Sound is 2.5/5 (Depends on various files)
Definetely for YouTube sound will be low...
+ Charging time is 4/5 that is 0% to 100% is 3 hrs 20min (No fast charge Supported)
+ Battery drainge is 3.5/5
- for offline video 12% drop for 1 hr (Watching movie)
therefore battery can go upto 6-8 hrs on offline video
- Same for YouTube 12% drop for 1 hr
- but working continuously while switching between the apps battery drainage will be also be higher
+ Excellent Device for Reading 5/5
+ A Very good build light weight (279gram)

Now The Main Con is
× Actual battery capacity is only 2904 mah battery...not 4080 mah battery

× Sometimes really sluggish 2GB Ram is not that Enough

# Conclusion
& Best for Reading and browsing
& Battery performance is ok ok
& Very Light Weight
& U get Screen protector within the box

Bought it at price of 5999.It was birthday gift for my brother.1st one has a glitch,dead on arrival.Replacement was prompt,thanks to flipkart.Lets come to the point 1.Display-8 inch IPS display does it's job with decent colour balance.Not expect HD or amoled quality display(Not even any closer),anyway it serves the purpose 2.Processor-Mediatek quad core processor clocked at 1.5GHz.Not a brilliant option if u want Multitasking or hardcore gamer but ok for normal usage.But no hang issue so far.3.Battery-Decent battery,with fair usage u can expect 2 days at ease.4.Sound-I was quite amazed with soundquality of this model.Fine and well balanced.5.Camera-I dont want to talk about of camera.It may disappoint you at large,But cant complain at this price segment.Lookwise it would feel a budget tab for sure,Mine was blue back cover(Velvet finish).If u keep the specification and price in mind I would say it'a a good choice,go for It.

1ST IMPRESSIONS ARE JUST WOW, GOT THIS BEAUTIFUL TAB UNDER 6K ,DISPLAY IS GOOD, LOOKS CLASSY,2GB RAM IS OK FOR BASIC TASKS AND READING PURPOSE, INBUILT APPS FOR KIDS ARE GOOD AND HELPFUL. OVER ALL A GREAT BUY.... HAVE TO SEE HOW IT PERFORMS IN LONG RUN, I LL UPDATE YOU FOR SURE.

Gifted my dad and he is very happy 😊😃. It’s a perfect piece for day to day usage for just leisure purposes like chatting & watching YouTube. Battery 🔋 performance is good as expected but don’t dream for taking snaps as camera 📷 is of average quality. For the price range I feel as a good deal with an latest Oreo 8.1 go edition.

nice delivery before given date From Flipkart ... awesome service nice table I like soo much very lightly n smoothly
you can also watch my videos on YouTube . rakendra sir channel

It is good enough by looking at its price...
It will run smooth if you’re not a heavy user.

At a budget of Rs. 8K this is the only tab with Oreo running right now. The LCD is quite bright with good contrast and colours and the sound quality is also commendable but the output level is a bit low. Being VoLTE enabled, it runs on Jio SIM flawlessly. Overall I found this better than Samsung or iBall Tabs in this range and lag is also less as compared to the others. Don't expect blazing fast performance on this but the processor does it's job well. One thing is to be noted that Youtube runs at max 720p on this tab, no FullHD....

I have gifted to my daughter on her 2nd Birthday 16 may 2019. she like her tab & use every day for 2-3 hours watching YouTube. very ruff & tuff handling by her but still working & in good condition till date (touch wood).

Battery backup is not bad at all, camera is just like VGA of old time below average , a little sluggish performance but overall it's quite impressive and currently there is no better than this in this price range, I will recommend everyone to purchase this for web surfing,pdf reading and video streaming though display is not that much impressive but it is sharp and feels good to eye.

Good tab for elderly people for viewing TV channels. I recommend this tab for giving best value for money.Got a very good packing for this product from flipkart,thanks flipkart. Got one day in advance that expected. Felling proud and happy about Flipkart
